LanguageData.Hediff_VenomGlands.label: venom glands
LanguageData.RS_BionicTail.label: bionic rakkle tail
LanguageData.RS_BionicTail.description: 생체공학 뱀 꼬리로 인해 이동속도가 약간 상승합니다.
LanguageData.RS_BionicBellyscale.label: bionic rakkle bellysclae
LanguageData.RS_BionicBellyscale.description: 생체공학 복판으로 인해 이동속도가 약간 상승합니다.
LanguageData.RS_WoodenTail.label: wooden snake tail
LanguageData.RS_WoodenTail.description: 꼬리가 잘린 부분에 장착한 가짜 꼬리입니다. 거추장스럽지만 없는 것 보다는 낫습니다.
LanguageData.RS_Thermostat.label: Rakkle Thermostat
LanguageData.RS_Thermostat.description: rakkle thermostatic terminal. A panel attached to the body detects the surrounding environment and regulates the body temperature.
LanguageData.RS_ObedienceTerminal.label: Rakkle obedience terminal
LanguageData.RS_ObedienceTerminal.description: forced obedience terminal for the slave rakkle of the cradle. As soon as you defy your master, you burn the nervous system with electric current. It also includes body metabolism, so you can move faster, but it's less durable.
